BondFunctor Class Reference

#include <PFunctors.h>

Inheritance diagram for BondFunctor:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A functor to be called on each bond and its source and destination atoms during a graph traversal of atoms and bonds. Create a subclass of BondFunctor to specify custom behavior.
